titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical used in the paper industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/8/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2001, the duty on phosphonic acid (((phosphonomethyl) imino) bis (2,1-ethanediylnitrilobis (methylene)) tetrakis (used in the paper industry).
